Seal characters (1)

淜字的基本解释

淜
píng
〔淜滂〕风吹物发出的声音。
蹚水过河。

淜
péng
〔普淜〕地名，在中国云南省。今作“普朋”。

淜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［píng］
［《廣韻》扶冰切，平蒸，並。］
［《集韻》皮冰切，平蒸，並。］
涉水过河。通作“馮”。
[②]［píng］
［《集韻》披冰切，平蒸，滂。］
象声词。风击物声或水声。
[③]［péng］
(1)见“淜3湃”、“淜3洪”、“淜3犇”、“淜3濆”。
(2)方言。堤坝。又作地名用字。普淜，在今云南省大理白族自治州邻接楚雄彝族自治州处。元代以后曾在此设驿站。

淜字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　淜； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页630第05
【集韻】披冰切，音砰。淜滂，水聲。一曰風擊物聲。【宋玉·風賦】飄忽淜滂。　又【玉篇】古文馮字。註詳冫部十畫。

淜字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
淜字的起名意思

暂无。

淜
Basic explanation of words
淜
píng
〔淜滂〕The sound of wind blowing things.
Wading across the river.
淜
péng
〔普淜〕The place name is in Yunnan Province, China. This is "Pupeng".
淜
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［píng］
["Guangyun" cut the ice, steamed, and combined. ]
["Ji Yun" skin ice cut, flat steamed, and. ]
Wading across the river. Known as "Feng".
[②]［píng］
["Jiyun" sliced on ice, steamed flat, and puffed. ]
Onomatopoeia. The sound of wind hitting objects or water.
[③]［péng］
(1) See "Pun 3 Pai", "Pun 3 Hong", "Pun 3 Ben", "Pun 3 Pai".
(2) Dialects. Dyke. Also used as a place name. Pumong is adjacent to Chuxiong Yi Autonomous Prefecture in Dali Bai Autonomous Prefecture, Yunnan Province. Post stations were set up here after the Yuan Dynasty.
淜
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Siji 1】【Shuizi Department】　淜; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 630 05
【Jiyun】Put the ice and cut, the sound is bang. Pongpong, the sound of water. One said the sound of wind hitting things. [Song Yu·Fu] Floating and fluttering.　[Jade article] Feng character in ancient text. Note the ten paintings in detail.
淜
